<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Gaming Website - About</title>
    <link href="https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.5.2/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="gamewebsite.css">
</head>
<body>
    <nav class="navbar navbar-expand-lg navbar-dark bg-dark">
        <a class="navbar-brand" href="index.html">Addicting Game</a>
        <button class="navbar-toggler" type="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#navbarNav" aria-controls="navbarNav" aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Toggle navigation">
            <span class="navbar-toggler-icon"></span>
        </button>
        <div class="collapse navbar-collapse" id="navbarNav">
            <ul class="navbar-nav ml-auto">
                <li class="nav-item">
                    <a class="nav-link" href="index.html">Home</a>
                </li>
                <li class="nav-item">
                    <a class="nav-link" href="games.html">Games</a>
                </li>
                <li class="nav-item active">
                    <a class="nav-link" href="about.html">About</a>
                </li>
                <li class="nav-item">
                    <a class="nav-link" href="contact.html">Contact</a>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </nav>

    <div class="container mt-5" style="color: aliceblue;">
        <div class="text-center">
            <h1 class="display-4">About Addicting Game</h1>
            <p class="lead">Learn more about our mission, vision, and team.</p>
            <hr class="my-4">
            <p>We are dedicated to providing the best gaming experience for our users. Hereâ€™s a bit more about who we are and what drives us.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-md-6">
                <h3>Our Mission</h3>
                <p>Our mission is to bring joy and excitement to gamers all over the world by offering a wide variety of engaging and entertaining games. We strive to create a platform where players of all ages can find something they love and enjoy.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-6">
                <h3>Our Vision</h3>
                <p>We envision a world where everyone can experience the joy of gaming. Our goal is to become the go-to destination for gamers seeking high-quality, fun, and safe gaming experiences. We aim to continuously innovate and improve our platform to meet the evolving needs of our community.</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="row mt-4">
            <div class="col-md-6">
                <h3>Our Team</h3>
                <p>We are a passionate team of gamers, developers, and designers who are committed to delivering the best gaming experience possible. Our diverse backgrounds and shared love for gaming drive us to push the boundaries of what's possible in the gaming industry.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-6">
                <h3>Join Us</h3>
                <p>Interested in joining our team? We are always on the lookout for talented individuals who share our passion for gaming. Check out our careers page for current openings and join us in our mission to create amazing gaming experiences.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.5.1.slim.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@popperjs/core@2.5.2/dist/umd/popper.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.5.2/js/bootstrap.min.js"></script>
    <script src="scripts.js"></script>
</body>
</html>

CSS


body {
    background-color: black;
    background: linear-gradient(to top,rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)100%,rgba(255,255,255,0)100%),url(https://wallpapers.com/images/file/green-and-black-background-6o7fi4exq0rbsvtw.jpg);
}

.navbar-brand {
    font-size: 1.5em;
    font-weight: bold;
    background: transparent;
}

.jumbotron {
    background-color: #343a40;
    color: white;
}

.card {
    margin-top: 20px;
}

.card-img-top {
    height: 200px;
    object-fit: cover;
}
